name: uscis-case-checker
description: Automated USCIS case status checker with Cloudflare bypass and Telegram notifications
author: GustavoZiaugra

commands.name: uscis-setup
commands.description: Configure the USCIS checker with your case number

commands.name: uscis-check
commands.description: Run a one-time USCIS case status check

commands.name: uscis-schedule
commands.description: Set up daily automated checks via cron

commands.name: uscis-status
commands.description: View your current USCIS case status

commands.name: uscis-logs
commands.description: View recent logs from the checker
